778380.name: Valley of the foxes
778380.description:
Welcome to the Valley of the foxes where your survival skills will be put on test.

In this battle royal game start by crafting your tools to protect yourself from other players and animals, eat whatever you can find and then run just to get killed. Do it all over again until you master the skill of surviving and become the true fox of the valley.

With many features added into game there are endless ways to trick your enemies, starting from fist fighting, building hideouts and other structures, angered animals, starvation and many other...

See you in the valley!
778380.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
